articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: First coronavirus deaths among evacuees from cruise ship
articles.description: Two elderly passengers aboard the Diamond Princess in Japan died from the coronavirus after their voyage on the ship. In the U.S., the first group of Americans have been released after their 14-day quarantine.

articles.author: Ben Collins
articles.title: Twitter is testing new ways to fight misinformation — including a community-based points system
articles.description: Twitter is experimenting with adding brightly colored labels directly beneath lies and misinformation posted by politicians and public figures, according to a leaked demo of new features sent to NBC News.
articles.content:
Twitter is experimenting with adding brightly colored labels directly beneath lies and misinformation posted by politicians and public figures, according to a leaked demo of new features sent to NBC News.

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: South Korea reports first coronavirus death as infections linked to church rise
articles.description: South Korea reported its first coronavirus death. The mayor of one city urged 2.5 million people to stay inside as infections linked to a church congregation spiked.
articles.content:
SEOUL, South Korea South Korea reported its first death from the new virus on Thursday while the mayor of a southeastern city urged its 2.5 million people to stay inside as infections linked to a church congregation spiked.
